channel.title: Cynicism on Mind Traps: The Ultimate Guide to 150 Cognitive Biases

item.title: Naive Cynicism
item.description:
Are You More Cynical About Others Than You Realize? Understanding Naive Cynicism #

We all like to think weâ€™re pretty good judges of character, right? But what if our judgment is subtly skewed, leading us to believe others are more self-serving than they actually are? Enter Naive Cynicism, a cognitive bias that can subtly poison our relationships, distort our understanding of the world, and even hinder our professional success.
